string.text: Listen, the boys are planning an ambush and we need to get our hands on some disguises. We have some artifacts we nabbed from wandering pigeons we can offer you.
Great! Here you go, as promised. Time to break out the old tailoring skills...

I managed to get the fuel station here working somehow. There's some kind of anomaly there that keeps replenishing the gas, but at a slow pace. Obviously, we can't drink gasoline, so we're willing to trade.
Keeping things quiet for us is important, obviously. To that end we're willing to trade some of our stuff to get our hands on suppressors.
We have a variety of medicines here that we don't really need. Most of the boys won't risk their necks diving into anomaly fields. We'll trade what we have if you have other kinds of drugs.
